# aussiefirewx

This R package provides a small dataset and an interactive Shiny app to
explore Fire Weather Index (FWI) and Monthly Severity Rating (MSR)
trends for south-eastern Australia.

## Installation

\`\`\`r \# install.packages(“remotes”)
remotes::install_github(“ETC5523-2025/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-ttra0196”)

# Package index

## User functions

- [`launch_app()`](https://ETC5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-ttra0196/reference/launch_app.md)
  : Launch the aussiefirewx Shiny app

## Datasets

- [`se_aus_fwi`](https://ETC5523-2025.github.io/assignment-4-packages-and-shiny-apps-ttra0196/reference/se_aus_fwi.md)
  : Fire weather indices for south-eastern Australia, 1979–2020
